Articles.Content:
So here's what I found in the (e)mail this morning:

![MuyhuNQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/MuyhuNQ.png)

I'm going to get flown over to Isreal for it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Good for you, pal.

I wish you good luck!
Wow. That's some pretty big deal right there.

Congratulations ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Bring back some photos and juicy gossip about what's going on inside our favorite industry ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Congratulations ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Bring back some photos and juicy gossip about what's going on inside our favorite industry ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I would like some too!

> 
> Congratulations ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Bring back some photos and juicy gossip about what's going on inside our favorite industry ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

You'll have to wait a bit. The conference is this coming October! (we'll probably have KSP 3.0 by then XD)

Great Job Neil! Congratulation.. It will be much to ask to have a look on that abstract? Although the hide name points to a "not", in that case just few details on your research?

I wish you the best.

> 
> Great Job Neil! Congratulation.. It will be much to ask to have a look on that abstract? Although the hide name points to a "not", in that case just few details on your research?
> I wish you the best.

I'd suspect that you could...

[http://www.iafastro.org/publications/iac-papers/](http://www.iafastro.org/publications/iac-papers/)

> 
> I'd suspect that you could...
> [http://www.iafastro.org/publications/iac-papers/](http://www.iafastro.org/publications/iac-papers/)

You couldn't buy the whole paper since we haven't sent in our final research yet (The IAF allows you to submit abstracts for conferences even if the paper is incomplete).
